item.title: About us
item.description:
I am glad that you have found us! ğŸ˜ƒ

Here I would like to let you participate in our journey ğŸ›¤ï¸ and to report on interesting topics in everyday dog life ğŸ¶. You will also read more about traveling with a dog and why I started a dog trainer education ğŸ•. Stay tuned!

Get to know Pepper

Birthday: ğŸ‚08.04.2009
Gender: Male
Breed: Shepherd-Collie-Mix ğŸ¶

Leisure:

We started mantrailing at the age of 10 and he loves it! ğŸ’In general, he loves to work with his nose or working together with me. For this reason we often work with sniff games or we develop new tricks with the clicker.
If Pepper has the opportunity, he also likes to look out of the window. At the moment, all windows in the apartment are a little higher and therefore he uses the balcony. In one of my earlier apartments my bed was in front of the window and, when I was not there, he was sitting comfortably on it and watching the world ğŸ˜‚ (actually he isn't allowed to go on the bed… otherwise I wouldn't have any space for myselfğŸ™ˆ).

Characteristics:

If he got to know and love â¤ï¸ a person, he literally goes crazy when that person visits. The visitor is then greeted wildly and, of course, it will be checked whether the person has something tasty for him.
On a walk, Pepper thinks it's great to roll in the grass ğŸŒ¿. It became a standard procedure and cannot be left out during every walk.

If you want to get to know more about Pepper or me, let me know! ğŸ˜
